ingredients: 8 skinless, boneless chicken thighs (about 2 pounds)   I used 2 lbs chicken breasts
8 garlic cloves, minced  I only used 4 garlic clovs
1 (15-ounce) can organic whole peeled tomatoes, undrained and crushed
1 (7-ounce) can salsa verde  or regular salsa
3 ounces shredded pepper-Jack cheese (about 3/4 cup)  I doubled the cheese
6 tablespoons Mexican crema  or sour cream
